content: hostile bunni make more bunnys now materials i used a size g hook and caron simply soft in turqoise and brown pattern 6 single_crochet in ring rd1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet rd2 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next around 18 single_crochet rd3 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet rd4 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 30 single_crochet rd5-15 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 30 single_crochet i don t remember how many rounds total i ended up doing i switched to brown in like the third single_crochet even round and then again a few rounds down totally up to you next round decrease 1 single_crochet over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet in blo then continue with regular decrease single_crochet in each round stuff and sew shut ears 5 single_crochet in ring rd1-6 single_crochet even fo sew to top of head finishing for the eyes i used black embroidery floss and a tapestry needle and the same with the mouth and nose enjoy pattern written by gnathalie2
